extensionDescription.message: This add-on works by showing a preview before printing. That can be done by clicking the button on the toolbar, shortcut keys or context menu.

works.message: By clicking on the extension icon or using the shortcut keys you can have a preview of the page you are accessing before printing, thus providing a paper economy in addition to avoiding repeated impressions, which certainly benefit the nature.

note.message: Note: This Add-on is completely free! Please consider make a small donation or write an review at addons.mozilla.org. Thank you!

release1.message:
Added Context menu 
Added page preferences

bugs.message: If you find any bugs, have any suggestions or some ideas for this add-on: Please create a new issue.

windows.message: Windows shortcut keys: Ctrl + Shift + U

mac.message: Mac shortcut keys: Command + Shift + U

linux.message: Linux shortcut keys: Ctrl + Shift + U
